sentences.sContent: Requirements volatility stems largely from the rapid pace at which underlying system technologies change; this leads to early obsolescence of designs and components that might otherwise be reusable.
sentences.sContent_eng: Requirements volatility stems largely from the rapid pace at which underlying system technologies change; this leads to early obsolescence of designs and components that might otherwise be reusable.
sentences.sCn: 在底层系统技术以快速的步伐发生变化时，需求变动性就会大量地滋生；这会导致设计和组件的提早退化，否则它们是可重用的。

words.tran: 荒废的；即将过时的；逐渐被废弃的
